description: An SCG definition is the configuration data used by the program to process the .XLS or .XLSX data source file, populate the template file and generate the output file. The configuration information includes project details, S curve files, S curve options, data source map, and data source filter. You can view the SCG Definition configuration data through the various tabs located on the main form.

Different versions of the myPM SCG application, such as Starter, Classic, and Pro, are available for purchase, each providing different features. Starter version uses the .SCGS extension and Classic uses the .SCGC extension for data files.
NOTE: myPM SCG Pro requires an installation of Microsoft Excel. The program has also been discontinued.
